title: India's biryani craze keeps food, delivery companies on their toes
description: Grover said the company is also conducting a pilot in Mumbai for ‘Mehfil-e-Behrouz’. “Under this, we will arrange a buffet-like setup for people wishing to host a gathering through Behrouz complete with table runners, and kebabs and curries as accompaniments,” he added.
